MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno, affecting properties in Whitelea Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 11:59AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional work that is need to repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:55PM on 08 April 2021.
